sentences.sContent: He is contemplating pawning his watch.

synos.tran: [贸易]典当；[经]抵押物；兵，卒；人质

trans.tranOther: one of the eight smallest and least valuable pieces which each player has in the game of  chess
If you pawn something that you own, you leave it with a pawnbroker, who gives you money for it and who can sell it if you do not pay back the money before a certain time
